name: Rising Sphere
description:
3D-Platformer located in a dark cyberpunk'ish World. A lost Sphere is trying to escape a dark Place.

The game was developed during a project in the module "Game Programming" at the University of Applied Sciences Flensburg. It is my first "real" game in Unity. So expect a few bugs - feel free to report them in the comments and also leave feedback if you want. I learned a lot during the development and hope you have some fun playing it.

** Actually, there should be a cutscene after the start, showing the Cubes taking over and the Sphere being taken by train from the start screen to a dark place. Maybe I'll add that when the time comes, so the Train and the Game-Start makes more sense :D **
